org.gbif.ws.client

Class BaseWsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.ws.client.BaseWsClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseWsGetClient, BaseWsSearchClient

    public abstract class BaseWsClient
extends Object
    The base webservice client for all GBIF clients not tight to a specific entity class but containing various convenience methods to deal with a web resource, paging and parameters.

      • get

        protected <T> T get(com.sun.jersey.api.client.GenericType<T> gt,
        String... path)
        Executes a json type http GET request with paths added to base resource. The passed generic type for the requested resource is used to convert the response into an object.
        Parameters:
        gt - the generic type of the returned resource.
        path - optional paths to be appended to the base resource.
        Returns:
        requested resource

      • get

        protected <T> T get(com.sun.jersey.api.client.GenericType<T> gt,
        org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page,
        String... path)
        Executes a json type http GET request with paths added to base resource. The passed generic type for the requested resource is used to convert the response into an object.
        Parameters:
        gt - the generic type of the returned resource.
        page - paging parameters to be applied to request.
        path - optional paths to be appended to the base resource.
        Returns:
        requested resource

      • get

        protected <T> T get(com.sun.jersey.api.client.GenericType<T> gt,
        javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> params,
        String... path)
        Executes a json type http GET request with paths added to base resource. The passed generic type for the requested resource is used to convert the response into an object.
        Parameters:
        gt - the generic type of the returned resource.
        params - extra query parameters to be added to request
        path - optional paths to be appended to the base resource.
        Returns:
        requested resource

      • get

        protected <T> T get(com.sun.jersey.api.client.GenericType<T> gt,
        @Nullable
        Locale locale,
        @Nullable
        javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> params,
        @Nullable
        org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page,
        String... path)
        Executes a json type http GET request with paths added to base resource. The passed generic type for the requested resource is used to convert the response into an object.
        Parameters:
        gt - the generic type of the returned resource.
        locale - identifier for a region to set http language header.
        page - paging parameters to be applied to request.
        params - extra query parameters to be added to request
        path - optional paths to be appended to the base resource.
        Returns:
        requested resource

      • get

        protected <T> T get(com.sun.jersey.api.client.GenericType<T> gt,
        org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page,
        com.sun.jersey.api.client.WebResource resource)
        Executes a json type http GET request to any given resource. The passed generic type for the requested resource is used to convert the response into an object. Note that the given web resource is used to send the http request and not the internal base resource.
        Parameters:
        gt - the generic type of the returned resource.
        page - paging parameters to be applied to request.
        resource - web resource to send request to.
        Returns:
        requested resource
